name: They can be Billions
description:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1TEDElNmdqw7XlheKTAVH4azeoUHIM1XD/view?usp=shari...

Top Down Shooter

WASD (move)

Shift (dash)

Mouse L R (atk 1 & 2) Just hold if you don't want to destroy your mouse.

Defeat opponents.

Get coins.

Open chests.

Exit through one of the accesses, but beware, the prices of the chests increase.

Chests lower the CD of attacks and dash, as well as providing some armor. 

If you die, you lose buffs.
